body.raw: # FocusSpark Web sitesi çalışmalarımı bir arada tutmak ve yazılarımdan diğer insanlarında yararlanmasını sağlamak maksadıyla oluşturulmuştur. FocusSpark static olarak tasarlanmış bir web sitesidir. Dinamik bir web sitesi olarak hizmete açmak gibi çalışmam olacaktır. [`Markdown{:html}`](https://www.markdownguide.org/) kullanarak hazırladığım notlarımı [`.mdx{:html}`](https://mdxjs.com/) dosyası olarak contentlayer altyapısını kullanarak siteme entegre ettim. **Demo FocusSpark** :globe_with_meridians: [FocusSpark](https://main--focusspark.netlify.app/) **Başlangıç Kod Dosyaları** :point_down: [FocusSpark](https://github.com/tugsef/client-blog) ## Kullanılan Araçlar - [React](https://react.dev/) - [Nextjs](https://nextjs.org/) - [TailwindCSS](https://tailwindcss.com/) - [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/) - [Framer Motion](https://www.framer.com/motion/) - [Content Layer](https://contentlayer.dev/) - [Formik](https://formik.org/docs/tutorial) - [Gencraft](https://gencraft.com/generate) This is a [`Next.js{html}`](https://nextjs.org/) project bootstrapped with [`create-next-app{:html}`](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/tree/canary/packages/create-next-app). ## Getting Started First, run the development server: ```bash npm run dev # or npx next start ``` Open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000) with your browser to see the result. You can start editing the page by modifying `app/page.tsx{:html}`. The page auto-updates as you edit the file. This project uses [`next/font{:html}`](https://nextjs.org/docs/basic-features/font-optimization) to automatically optimize and load Inter, a custom Google Font. ## Learn More To learn more about Next.js, take a look at the following resources: - [Next.js Documentation](https://nextjs.org/docs) - learn about Next.js features and API. - [Learn Next.js](https://nextjs.org/learn) - an interactive Next.js tutorial. You can check out [the Next.js GitHub repository](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/) - your feedback and contributions are welcome!
